what is New_Media?

New Media is humans playing, breaking, learning, building, fixing, and innovating with technology in search of new forms of communication, art and entertainment. It's anything, you make it – it's everything, you create it. New media is YOU experimenting with the power and mysterious possilbilities of technology.

faq

What can I do with a nm_degree?

You can

proof_nm

Highest Salaries

Designers with website design and digital animation experience will have the best opportunities and likely the highest salaries in the profession.

Source: Bureau of Labor Statistics

Exceeds Sports

The economic impact of art and design exceeds that of sports worldwide

Source: U.S. Bureau of Education

Over 30%

Creative jobs have grown from 10% to over 30% of the economy

Source: Americans for the Arts

42%

By 2016, jobs for artists and designers are predicted to increase by 42%

Source: National Endowment for the Arts

3rd & 4th

Computer Science and Software Engineering are ranked by Forbes as the 3rd and 4th Most Valuable College Majors

Source: Forbes

150 million

Integer posuere erat a ante venenatis dapibus posuere velit aliquet. Nullam quis risus eget urna mollis ornare vel eu leo.

Source: Name Here

More than 80%

Nulla vitae elit libero, a pharetra augue.

Source: Name Here

Wow

Source: Name Here

Our_Story

We are a science experiment brought together to blend the disciplines of artist, designer, and computer scientist. We are a rare bunch who push oursleves to open our minds and produce creative work in a broad spectrum of softwares and technological devices – and then, after we have made a crazy assortment of projects, we choose and focus on our specialty with well rounded experience in new media and a widened understanding of processes. Check out what a typical portfolio of one of our graduates looks like.

Check this out!

Click here

Our_Belief

“Experimentation is relevant to any discipline but particularly New Media because its new, so how are you going to know what's possible unless you play and break things to see how it works”

Curt Cloninger, Professor of New Media at UNC Asheville

this is the future

your_story

typical graduate's portfolio


If you graduate from here with a BA in New Media, the potential that you will leave with a diverse portfolio will be great. You will get the opportunity to gain experience across multiple disciplines, technological devices and software.

  • Custom mythical creature
  • Promotional video using type animation
  • Responsive website featuring a non-linear experience that demonstrates the mystery of memory through interactivity
  • Director of an episode for a Independent Pilot Show
  • Experimental web-based scrolling collage built out of custom animated gifs
  • A collection of fine art pieces disassembled and animated into gifs that reveal the power of manipulation via digital media
  • Interactive mucsical interface website
  • 3-d animated short film
  • Music video
  • Personal logo
  • Pitch deck template
  • Stop-motion film
  • Abstract film
  • T-shirt design
  • Web application using an api that evaluates the sentiment of text and website urls
  • Custom typeface that was offered online as a free download
  • Realistic 3-d environment modeled, textured, and lighting in Maya
  • Narrative short film

that's what we got

create the life you want

location

unc asheville campus is located in the mountains of Asheville, NC, which is home to Moog Music Inc, Bob Moog Foundation, The Black Mountain College Museum + Arts Center and The Center for Craft, Creativity and Design. The diverse spirit of new media lives hear.

Contact

New Media is all about questions and finding answers and when you can't find any answers you create one. Get in touch if you have questions.

New Media at UNC Asheville

205 Zeis Hall, CPO # 2015
One University Heights
Asheville, NC 28804
+1 828 350 4567

info@nm.unca.edu
